Title: Using Jianying App for Video Editing
Content: Jianying is a versatile mobile app used for video editing. To start, open the Jianying app on your phone. You will see various features like 'One-click Video' and 'Photo-to-Video'. The 'One-click Video' feature is particularly useful for quickly creating videos by importing a few images, which the app then converts into a video template. This feature is ideal for creating secondary original content. For more detailed editing, you can import a video, mute its original sound, and then proceed with trimming, zooming, and adjusting the playback speed. Additionally, you can add text and stickers to enhance your video. These elements can be customized in terms of duration and placement. Finally, you can add background music, ensuring to trim it to fit the video length. Once all edits are complete, export the video by clicking the export button in the top right corner. This process allows you to create engaging and polished videos directly from your mobile device.

Title: Adding and Customizing Text and Stickers
Content: Adding text and stickers to your videos can make them more engaging and informative. In Jianying, you can easily add these elements by selecting the 'Text' or 'Stickers' options. When adding text, you can type in your desired content and adjust its duration to control how long it appears on the screen. This is useful for adding captions, titles, or any other relevant information. Similarly, stickers can be added to highlight specific parts of the video or to add a fun element. Both text and stickers can be resized, repositioned, and customized to match the style of your video. However, it's important to use these features judiciously. Overloading your video with too many elements can make it look cluttered. Aim for a clean and simple design that enhances the viewer's experience without overwhelming them.

Title: Ensuring Smooth and Engaging Videos
Content: Creating smooth and engaging videos is crucial for capturing and retaining your audience's attention. Start by ensuring that your video flows well and is easy to follow. Avoid abrupt cuts and transitions that can disrupt the viewer's experience. Use the trimming and zooming features in Jianying to remove any unnecessary parts and to focus on the key elements of your video. Adding background music can also enhance the viewing experience, but make sure to trim the music to fit the video length and to avoid any abrupt endings. Additionally, the first few seconds of your video are critical for grabbing attention. Make sure your video starts with a strong and interesting visual or message. If your video fails to capture interest within the first few seconds, viewers are likely to scroll past it. Lastly, consider the overall design and aesthetics of your video. A clean and professional look can make your video more appealing and engaging.
